Empty().details: An operation (e.g. {front}) couldn't be completed due to the queue being empty.

OutOfBounds().details: An operation (e.g. {at}) couldn't be completed due to an index being out of bounds.

params.binType: The type of the bin ("L" for long, "S" for short).
params.feeRate: The fee rate of the bin.

acceptAddLiquidity(LiquidityPool storage.details: This function validates the trading fee rate      and calls the acceptAddLiquidity function on the target liquidity bin.

params.amount: The amount of liquidity to add.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

acceptClaimLiquidity(LiquidityPool stora.details: This function validates the trading fee rate      and calls the acceptClaimLiquidity function on the target liquidity bin.

params.amount: The amount of liquidity to claim.        (should be the same as the one used in acceptAddLiquidity)
params.oracleVersion: The oracle version used for the claim.        (should be the oracle version when call acceptAddLiquidity)
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

returns._0: The amount of liquidity (CLB tokens) received as a result of the liquidity claim.

acceptClaimPosition(LiquidityPool storag.details: This function verifies if the absolute value of the realized position pnl is within the acceptable margin range.      It retrieves the target liquidity bins based on the position quantity and the bin margins from the position.      Then, it divides the position parameters to match the bin margins.      Depending on the value of the realized position pnl, it either claims the position fully or partially.      The claimed pnl is distributed among the liquidity bins according to their respective margins.

params.position: The Position object representing the position to claim.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.

acceptClosePosition(LiquidityPool storag.details: This function calculates the target liquidity bins based on the position quantity.      It retrieves the maker margin and bin margins from the position.      Then, it divides the position parameters to match the bin margins.      Finally, it closes the liquidity bins with the provided parameters.

params.position: The Position object representing the close position request.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.

acceptOpenPosition(LiquidityPool storage.details: This function calculates the target liquidity bins based on the position quantity.      It prepares the bin margins and divides the position parameters accordingly.      Then, it opens the liquidity bins with the corresponding parameters and trading fees.

params.position: The Position object representing the open position.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.

acceptRemoveLiquidity(LiquidityPool stor.details: This function validates the trading fee rate      and calls the acceptRemoveLiquidity function on the target liquidity bin.

params.clbTokenAmount: The amount of CLB tokens to remove.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

acceptWithdrawLiquidity(LiquidityPool st.details: This function validates the trading fee rate      and calls the acceptWithdrawLiquidity function on the target liquidity bin.

params.clbTokenAmount: The amount of CLB tokens to withdraw.        (should be the same as the one used in acceptRemoveLiquidity)
params.oracleVersion: The oracle version used for the withdrawal.        (should be the oracle version when call acceptRemoveLiquidity)
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

returns.amount: The amount of base tokens withdrawn
returns.burnedCLBTokenAmount: the amount of CLB tokens burned.

binValue(LiquidityPool storage,int16,LpC.details: Retrieves the value of a specific bin in the LiquidityPool storage for the provided trading fee rate.

params._tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to calculate the bin value.
params.ctx: The LP context containing relevant information for the calculation.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.

returns.value: The value of the specified bin.

claimableLiquidity(LiquidityPool storage.details: Retrieves the claimable liquidity information for a specific trading fee rate and oracle version from a LiquidityPool.

params.oracleVersion: The oracle version for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.
params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool struct.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate for which to retrieve the claimable liquidity.

returns._0: claimableLiquidity An instance of ILiquidity.ClaimableLiquidity representing the claimable liquidity information.

distributeEarning(LiquidityPool storage,.details: This function distributes the earnings among the liquidity bins,      proportional to their total balances.      It iterates through the trading fee rates      and distributes the proportional amount of earnings to each bin      based on its total balance relative to the market balance.

params.earning: The total earnings to be distributed.

getBinFreeLiquidity(LiquidityPool storag.details: This function retrieves the liquidity bin based on the trading fee rate      and calls the freeLiquidity function on it.

params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

returns.amount: The free liquidity amount in base tokens.

getBinLiquidity(LiquidityPool storage,in.details: This function retrieves the liquidity bin based on the trading fee rate      and calls the liquidity function on it.

params.self: The reference to the LiquidityPool storage.
params.tradingFeeRate: The trading fee rate associated with the liquidity bin.

returns.amount: The total liquidity amount in base tokens.

liquidityBinStatuses(LiquidityPool stora.details: Retrieves the liquidity bin statuses for the LiquidityPool using the provided context.

params.ctx: The LpContext containing the necessary context for calculating the bin statuses.

returns._0: stats An array of ILiquidity.LiquidityBinStatus representing the liquidity bin statuses.

prepareBinMargins(LiquidityPool storage,.details: This function prepares bin margins by performing the following steps:      1. Calculates the appropriate bin margins         for each trading fee rate based on the provided quantity and maker margin.      2. Iterates through the target bins based on the quantity,         finds the minimum available fee rate,         and determines the upper bound for calculating bin margins.      3. Iterates from the minimum fee rate until the upper bound,         assigning the remaining maker margin to the bins until it is exhausted.      4. Creates an array of BinMargin structs         containing the trading fee rate and corresponding margin amount for each bin.

params.makerMargin: The maker margin of the position.

returns._0: binMargins An array of BinMargin representing the calculated bin margins.

LiquidityBinEarningAccumulated(uint16,by.notice: Emitted when earning is accumulated for a liquidity bin.

acceptAddLiquidity(LiquidityPool storage.notice: Accepts an add liquidity request         and processes the liquidity bin corresponding to the given trading fee rate.

acceptClaimLiquidity(LiquidityPool stora.notice: Accepts a claim liquidity request         and processes the liquidity bin corresponding to the given trading fee rate.

acceptClaimPosition(LiquidityPool storag.notice: Accepts a claim position request and processes the corresponding liquidity bins         based on the realized position pnl.

acceptClosePosition(LiquidityPool storag.notice: Accepts a close position request and closes the corresponding liquidity bins.

acceptOpenPosition(LiquidityPool storage.notice: Accepts an open position and opens corresponding liquidity bins.

acceptRemoveLiquidity(LiquidityPool stor.notice: Accepts a remove liquidity request         and processes the liquidity bin corresponding to the given trading fee rate.

acceptWithdrawLiquidity(LiquidityPool st.notice: Accepts a withdraw liquidity request         and processes the liquidity bin corresponding to the given trading fee rate.

distributeEarning(LiquidityPool storage,.notice: Distributes earnings among the liquidity bins.

getBinFreeLiquidity(LiquidityPool storag.notice: Retrieves the free liquidity amount in base tokens for the specified trading fee rate.

getBinLiquidity(LiquidityPool storage,in.notice: Retrieves the total liquidity amount in base tokens for the specified trading fee rate.

prepareBinMargins(LiquidityPool storage,.notice: Prepares bin margins based on the given quantity and maker margin.

settle(LiquidityPool storage,LpContext).notice: Settles the liquidity bins in the LiquidityPool.

userdoc.notice: Library for managing liquidity bins in an LiquidityPool
